commit.title: [split] remove remnants of sbt in cassie
[split] Tweetbutton in mesos, discover cassandra with zk.
[split] release 5.3.13 of util + bump util to 5.3.14-SNAPSHOT
[split] refactor ServerSetsCluster constructor to be more friendly to service discovery
[split] Oscar Boykin implemented this for Summingbird, but it seems like it would be more generally useful here.
[split] release 5.3.16 of finagle - In support of: https://reviewboard.twitter.biz/r/88011
[split] release 5.3.15 of finagle - release for https://reviewboard.twitter.biz/r/86024
[split] release 5.3.14 of finagle - New release for code in: https://reviewboard.twitter.biz/r/87153
[split] Fix version of util to the next "-snapshot"
[split] setting service-292 and scala-parent-292 versions to 0.0.4 in all projects
[split] patch public release of OSS libraries; catch up sbt
[split] Cassie: Remove com.twitter.logging dep in favor of slf4j
[split] remove a layer of default arguments in cassie.
[split] adding map to the cassie iteratees
[split] Use the same version of slf4j as Finagle
[split] scala 2.9.2 version of cassie  - fix scalatest deprecation warnings  - remove deprecation warnings on @deprecated. :)  - fix java compat  - Upgrade Cassie to Scala 2.9.2 and latest Finagle
[split] add OWNERS and GROUPS to cassie
[split] Cassie dependendencies need to be moved to latest again.
[split] Add basic rowIteratee support to FakeCassandra
[split] getting rid of dependency management, go to explicit versions + maven-tools/maven-release
[split] baby steps on converting dependency managemnet solution
[split] Use tcpConnectTimeout and connectTimeout for ClientBuilder. This will set the correct timeout for a TCP connection.
[split] finagle: annotate client connection when tracing
[split] supporting deploy skipping, fixing gizzard deps
[split] If there are no mutations in the batch there's no need to send it to Cassandra
[split] Do the tracing negotiation after the keyspace has been set
[split] Fixes Cassie tracing regression. CassandraThriftFramedCodec stopped calling tracing code in ThriftClientFramedCodec in some Finagle refactoring.
[split] Change the default consistency level in ColumnFamily from Quorum to LocalQuorum
[split] finagle: better support for multiplexed protocols
[split] log when we have upside down timeouts in cassie
[split] a basic stress test for cassie
[split] cassie: Fix BatchMutationBuilder to use passed in Column TTL
[split] fix cassie Plugins.scala to work outside the corp network
[split] some changes from security for open source
[split] Adding thread in ZookeeperClusterServerSet to poll cluster changes; otherwise it'll block
[split] Revert "Cluster API is now generic. It supports snapshot of host list as well as future changes."
[split] Cluster API is now generic. It supports snapshot of host list as well as future changes. HeapBalancer now supports dynamic heap size. Getting rid of all other load balancers
[split] update readme and docs for cassie
[split] better error handling for things not running in a future
[split] per our style guide, making sure that all public methods have explicit types in cassie

[split] In preparation for open-sourcing Cassie, I'm doing a bit of work to make things cleaner/nicer. This patch attempts to bring the CounterColumnFamily up to api parity with ColumnFamily. I'm really not happy with the amount of duplication required for this, but I think we should tackle that later (basically we need to put Column and CounterColumn in a type hierarchy of some kind).
[split] make FakeCassandra support out-of-order inserts (last timestamp wins)
[split] some minor cassie cleanups, mostly done by ScalariformPlugin
[split] rockdove: remove cassandra test dependencies and use cassie FakeCassandra
[split] Use serversets to pick up Cassandra nodes. Also changes Cluster and ServerSetsCluster to have common base to allow for easy replacement of both
[split] cassie: add super column support to FakeCassandra, handle reversed slice range start/finish
[split] Make cassie loggers static, and be more specific
[split] cassie: pass port to ClusterRemapper to preserve it across remapping
[split] make cassie reducer take an optional port
[split] moving cassie DO_NOT_CI to the right place.

[split] Lookups in index by one point in time and limit B3:  * Instead of looking up trace ids by start and end time we now look up by a point in time and "limit" number of entries before that. This way we will know exactly how many entries we will fetch, making it harder for services that send us tons of traces to cause timeouts on the ui due to too much data.  * Snuck in a match in the time skew adjuster so it does not throw an exception if endpoint is missing in the span.
[split] remove a line referencing a non-existant class
[split] make fakecassandra spin up on random port
[split] Set port to 0 to have os pick port. Expose server socket in FakeCassandra so we can pick up the port selected
[split] Putting all of the twitter-specific stuff related to snowflake in the cage
[split] Macaw-web adds a TFE style router, chunked encoding and a mustache controller
[split] Update configurations and libraries to use tracer factory introduced to make it possible to release resources properly in tracers
[split] Use multigetRows for getTracesByIds. Upgrade Scrooge. Upgrade commons-collection in Cassie to avoid conflict
[split] Add multigetRows to fetch a range of columns from a set of rows

[split] In order to give very specific error messages to timeouts in finagle (so beginners know which settings in the client and server builder caused them), I'm adding lots of human-readable messages to the various TimeoutExceptions.
[split] Change ColumnsIteratee to take an optional start and end column.
[split] added some usage docs to the cassie serversets impl
[split] fix CI. commented out test should work in non-tests
[split] Remove the useless ColumnFamilyLike trait from cassie.
[split] Make slices specified by start and end column names return lists, rather than maps.
[split] Adds Finagle trace annotations that describe what was requested. Such as keyspace, column, key and so forth.
[split] make cassie work in the cage
add script for releasing that pushes docs
fix getRowSlice, add multigetRow and multigetRowSlice for super column families
Set the name of the ClientBuilder
There was no changelog entry for 0.12.0... oops?
Record failures for each timing instance
Implement describe_ring method. Returns a TokenRange that points the whole range to the local test instance
accept many zookeeper hosts for ServerSetsCluster
make the statsreceiver passing more explicit
time all the thrift rpc's. also get rid of the default mocking (
high level latency stats for each thrift method
switch from Ints to Durations for timeouts internally. will change the public api later
doing our out timeouts over the top of our retries
upgrade finagle and add the appropriate new timeouts
Fix for potential NullPointerException in FakeCassandra remove
It would be bad for cluster mapping attempts to stack on top of one another: instead, ensure that we try every seed a few times.
Use infinite retries and a full seed list in ClusterRemapper
a different retry policy for non-idempotent operations
major update to RowsIteratee. makes the code more clear and fixes a few bugs. tests forthcoming
no more case class for RowsIteratee
fix column iteratee and add tests
update the changelog that robey didn't
add stats counters for the various retryable exceptions
Allow user to set a tracer. Make the codec usage a bit neater.
Fixed up RB problems, API BROKEN
Added support for iteraration over columns
try upgrading util version to help out rvp
suppport adding to counters in FakeCassandra
Remove all of these jars added by intellij
Abstract some of BatchMuatationBuilder into a BatchMutation trait
Reimplemented columnsIteratee with just a key
Better exception handling for methods that return futures.
remove a bunch of alternative types
make codecs explicit instead of implicit
a bunch of shallow changes to make our imports more consistent
simplify some bits of CounterColumnFamily. probably need to do more to merge this with ColumnFamily
add a test for the empty case
minor doc formatting updates for types
add each and local quorum consistency levels
minor doc formatting changes to Order
remove a bunch of scaladocs from the CF class, let them fall back to CFL
make all the *As methods private. If you want to use a different type/codec copy the CF object.
execute method added to Keyspace, brittspace script is aggressive :/
add svn repo to hadoop subproject
get rid of disabled test for now
update project file to reflect no cassandra
clean up brittspace, factor out cassandra dependency
take away the ability to configure the clock.
remove @author docs. we all own this.
deal with errors in mapping clusters
fix bug in encoding Integer.MAX_VALUE. also added a few tests
comment out fetchHosts test for now
add api for deletions at a timestamp
fix a bunch of miscellaneous classpath errors with hadoop integration
add changelog entry about connection timeout
Added tests, working counters without batch stuff
set retries to 0. this will be both less surprising and also work around the problem where no exceptions are thrown
Extract iteration logic into an async-friendly ColumnIteratee class.
Add missing file, and remove comment.
fix compilation error by commenting out offending code.
move thrift to test folder, thread locals
support for thrift-encoded values in cassie
switch from PeriodicBackgroundProcess to a finagle timer
Upgrade to finagle 1.1.15 to allow for proper teardown.
Remove coda`s packaging magic: defaults appear to work swimmingly.
refactoring to make the cluster re-mapping easier
Require a clock to convert from Column to thrift.Column
switch from logulat to ostrich3 for logging
upgraded to scala 2.8.1. tests pass, but with hella warnings
get rid of case class with no params
Update examples to use the client asynchronously
throw and exception when you try to serialize with no timestamp
refactor BatchMutationBuilder to delay making timestamps unless you ask it to
move Column's clock parameter from implicit to explicit
Convert insert/batch/remove to blocking calls (we should probably just expose the futures in the future. future.)
Add publishing, and remove the manual libthrift dependency
Clean up Examples, and confirm both.
Add close() method: apparently not completely cleaning up Finagle state
Remove implicit clock: failing some tests
Deprecate the (insert|get)As methods in favor of copy constructor for codec changes.
Alternative implicit clock provider for Java.
Continue Javaification: expose the batch builder rather than passing a block.
Add simple Java API Cluster creation.
Add very simple ColumnFamily JUnit test, and migrate client mocking to Java
Upgrade Finagle and add set_keyspace during connection setup.
Expose Java collections: it's easier to convert implicitly from Scala then explicitly from Java.
Make ConsistencyLevel a "session" level setting, rather than a default parameter
Migrate Cluster and Keyspace to the builder pattern
Remove custom connection handling code in favor of Finagle
Fix mocking to work with an intermediate Future as provided by finagle`s ServiceToClient
Incorporate into Twitter build process, and include Finagle`s codegen
Refresh README for parameterized key types and CLuster->Keyspace changes.
Parameterize the types of row keys: this isn`t really sustainable, unless we`re going to do super type system magic for super columns.
Make setting the keyspace the first step on an open connection
Make the keyspace object the heavyweight object holding the ClientProvider object
Remove `keyspace` parameter, and convert keys to ByteBuffers using a (currently) static key codec
Port `codecs` package to ByteBuffers for Thrift 0.5
WIP: Begin upgrade to Cassandra 0.7 and Thrift 0.5
Update to Scala 2.8, and refresh Logula
Make sure the ConnectionPool tests give enough time for the eviction thread to work.
Use Thrift's new fast UTF8 decoder instead of String's constructor.
Added a simple lock to ensure only a single request hits a recovering node.
Added a read timeout to ClientFactory and Cluster.
Only log about the node being up if it was previously down.
Shuffle some files around because I'm picky.
Absolutely massive refactor to swap out all the connection logic.
Added toString implementations and todos for logging.
Merge BasicConnectionPool into ConnectionPool by figuring out how to mock it.
Added RC5 as the default build target.
Might as well thank folks by name.
ColumnIIterator shouldn't throw an empty list exception if the column family is empty.
multigetColumnAs shouldn't throw an empty iterator exception if the column doesn't exist.
Add RC3 as a build target and use my rsync-sbt plugin.
Whoops. That didn't compile at all.
Recover from command timeouts by retrying.
Add RC2-compatible versions of logula and scalaj-collections.
Still needs RC2 versions of scalaj-collection and logula.
Got less clever with LexicalUUID decoding.
Extracted FNV1A out to its own class.
Refactored out a lot of bitslicing in favor of using ByteBuffer.
Added an implicit conversion for String<->LexicalUUID.
Added a hostname-based worker ID generator for LexicalUUID.
Now publishing a JAR which includes all Cassandra/Thrift dependencies.
Added Apache Commons Codec as a dependency.
Actually set the default consistency levels.
A few quick refactors for James' patches.
add startKey and endKey. the API isn't perfect, but it's a start.
add reversed parameter to getRow and getRowAs
add count parameter to getRow and getRowAs
Separated out Cassie's types into their own package.
Huge refactor to make consistency levels default parameters.
Add per-call polymorphism with implicit codecs.
Added implicit conversions for Cassie's types.
Convert BatchMutationBuilder to use implicit codecs.
Move codec implicits into a package object.
Make ClientProvider return a Cassandra.Iface instead of .Client.
Refactor the slicing and dicing for reuse.
Updated README to reflect Cassie's awesome new powers.
Added batch and column set removal to ColumnFamily.
Added a test for the implicitly-timestamped removes.
Added a test for the single-column multiget.
Added a test for the single-column get.
Split up the ColumnFamily contracts into read and write parts.
Added a list of things what ain't done yet.
Moved retry logic into a testable class. Also, made retrying work.
Make ClusterMap responsible for creating a connection.
